description: Kook, Ẓevi Judah ben Abraham Isaac, ha-Kohen, 1891-1982 -- Photographs
label: Rabbi Yehuda Zvi Kuk arriving to the Western Wall for the prayers of the Tisha B'Av, memorial for the Holy Temple which was destroyed by the Romans two thousand years ago.
